FuncDef: This command configures the codeset to be used for the encoding of QL values into PTP clockClass values when the profile is configured for G.8265.1. The codeset is defined in Table 1/G.8265.1. This setting only applies to the range of values observed in the clockClass values transmitted out of the node in Announce messages. The router will support the reception of any valid value in Table 1/G.8265.1

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the values used on a G.781 Option 1 compliant network.
Specifies the values used on a G.781 Option 2 compliant network.
